school: Chemistry & Molec Biosciences, Veterinary Science School
description: Anatomy of the oral cavity, gastro-intestinal tract, liver & pancreas. Cellular, organ & whole body regulation of carbohydrate, lipid & amino acid metabolism in mammals. Elimination of waste products. Nutrient-endocrine & nutrient-gene interactions. Food & feed composition & nutritive value. Development, sites & mechanism of digestion & absorption in different species, diet & nutrient profiles for tissue use.
restricted: Enrolment restricted to Veterinary Science students only
